#summary Release notes for Pinax releases

= Pinax Release Notes =

These are the release notes for each release of Pinax. Ordered latest releases first.

== 0.5.1 ==

 * Python 2.4 support
 * Removal of Pownce support
 * Fixed a bug in django_openidconsumer that prevented login on some deployments. See [http://code.pinaxproject.com/codebases/codebase/pinax/changesets/1292/ r1292] for more information.
